block.p: LEAD: Israel set up emergency telephone hot lines Tuesday and prepared insecticide-spraying planes to fly into action against a possible plague of locusts, the desert insects dreaded since biblical times. Only a small number of locusts were sighted in southern Israel and the Jordan River valley, but officials warned of a possible larger invasion from the south.
